website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a paddle brush for blow-drying and styling, choose this one.
pros: Reduces stress to hair and scalp during blow-drying and styling
Ideal for smoothing hair during blow-drying to create smooth, straight styles

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality. Fake. Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap and not worth the expense. On the picture, the reviewed product is shown on the left. On the right there is one I already had of the same brand that wanted to get replaced. Comparing the two, the new one is not made of wood but plastic. Even though it is advertised as a wooden brush. The package came with the Aveda logo but who can assure of this was a fake? Completely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WeWy_CHuLiN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality- I have another Aveda brush that is made way better. Seems like a knock off
customer_reviews.author: Uma Narine

customer_reviews.title: Why did you douse this w/ old lady perfume?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairbrush to replace the exact one I bought 10 years ago which recently started falling apart. The hairbrush reeks of nasty perfume. I've tried washing it a few times to get the smell out which has helped a little. I'm hopig the half life of the odor is less than the radiation from Chernobyl so I can use said hairbrush and not be killed by the overwhelming stench.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Awful!! It was destroyed within the first 15 minutes of use!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is NOT worth your money! The bristles bent beyond being able to use after the first 15 minutes of drying my hair. I have very thick and curly hair and I always straighten it with a paddle brush before using my flat iron. I have never had a brush crumple on me like this within the first use. It’s just another overpriced product that ends up in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best all around brush
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brush. Great for wet or dry. We used it for 2 years and it is still great. Cost more but worth it. Oh yeah ... doesn't break my hair. My wife has long thick hair about 40 inches and she lives this brush.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! I bought this same brush from an Aveda Salon 6 years ago. I have loved it, so I decided to buy another to keep for when I shower at work. The brush purchased on Amazon is NOT the same! It did not have the same finish, the bristles are bending, the bristle pad pulls out, it became warped after about a month, and it is completely worn. I’m so disappointed and feel I was ripped off. Please see attached photos. 1st photo is my “new” brush from Amazon, 2nd photo is my 6 year old brush from the salon. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My third
customer_reviews.text: I'm now on my third Aveda paddle brush. They last five years. Well made. Comfortable. Works well for styling or just brushing. Feels great on the scalp. Not sure if I'm the only one out there who does this, but sometimes I brush my hair just because it feels so good. If you can relate you'll love this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Over priced, inexpensive wooden handle, cheaply made, expected more out of Aveda, made in China
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: ... different hair brushes over the years I've found the perfect one!
customer_reviews.text: After trying out so many different hair brushes over the years I've found the perfect one!
customer_reviews.author: ashi.me

customer_reviews.title: I can’t  live without this brush
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted that Amazon had this in stock... my previous one I purchased I had for five years and it broke in half because I have extremely long curly thick hair... I ordered a replacement and had a new one the next day 😁
customer_reviews.author: Karemia Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Strong handle
customer_reviews.text: This one hasn't broken in half, when trying to brush out my godly mane. If you have inordinately thick hair, this is a solid investment
customer_reviews.author: Social Construct

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! Goes thru your hair but does not pull.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Have been used this brush for a year. It is super comfortable and soft! I brush my head three times a day. I can't say it did help me grow more hair, but I had less dandruff after used it.
customer_reviews.author: xiao h.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for the money
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my brush of probably 20 years. This is a very nice quality brush and functions like a brush of 3 times the price. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Braddock

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the product that I just received. You can see there is one bristle missing. It is pretty dusty before I even start to use... A little bit disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS IS A FAKE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS IS A FAKE I bought it because it was an “Amazon’s Choice” now I know Amazon is not yo be trusted. The picture advertised is not the brush I received. I would rate zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymison Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I can detangle my hair a lot faster. It is pricey, but I have dense kinky hair and its worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Michelle Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: One of the bristles on the brush was missing and the brush felt very cheap. It’s too lightweight. Judging by the reviews, it’s most likely non-authentic. I wouldn’t suggest buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Elashia Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off, not Aveda
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, cheap plastic. I’ve had Aveda paddle brush for years. This is a knock-off
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Greater feeling brush that does its job grooming in an animal friendly way.
customer_reviews.author: michael miller

customer_reviews.title: The GOAT
customer_reviews.text: Best paddle brush of all time! Effortlessly detangles my type 4 hair. No brush can compare!
customer_reviews.author: Inayah Davis

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. Very lightweight and easy to hold. Very comfortable feeling on my head.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real Aveda brush . It’s too light and the bristles are spaces differently .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair, its thick but fine, this brush works great with getting through tangles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: fake product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fake replica. Its made in China and is NOT an Aveda product. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I've had in probably over 20 years. While expensive, they really last. I have gone through 2 other brand paddle brushes in the past few years and both ended up falling apart in the end, so I'm glad to have Aveda one again.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Brown

customer_reviews.title: What kind of sorcey is this?!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It glides through my hair! No brush ever did that before! What is this sorcery?
customer_reviews.author: Shaheen S. Aldossary

customer_reviews.title: Natural Hair
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my old Aveda Wooden Large Paddle Brush. This brush will last you well over 7 years. No kidding!
customer_reviews.author: Runner Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fake??
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used aveda paddle brushes for probably 20 years and buy a new one from Aveda about every two years. They have always maintained consistent quality. Until now - there is very obvious difference in the form & feel of this brush and it seems to pull and break too much vs sliding through my long, coarse and curly hair to straighten.
customer_reviews.author: Tami A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy return
customer_reviews.text: This brush was in my backpack which was stolen. I bought same Aveda brush to replace it. Unfortunately this brush whistled and squeaked with every stroke through my hair. I returned it which was super easy. The rubber pad the bristles were imbedded in was faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Suski

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Brush
customer_reviews.text: Don't pay $32 for this brush. It is advertised as a wooden brush, but I highly doubt that it is. It is more like plastic made to look like wood. It is very light, not at all the way a wooden brush feels. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Partyka

customer_reviews.title: Great quality brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! I was told to use a wet brush because I have platinum hair and the bristles on other brushes tend to break my hair, so I read many great reviews about this brush and it does not break my hair and works perfect for using as a more straight blowout.
customer_reviews.author: Queenof3hrts

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it broke so quickly
customer_reviews.text: The entire plastic piece inside the wooden paddle came off within a month of purchase. I tried to put it back together but the bristle piece just comes out anytime I hit a knot. I spent more on this brush because I wanted something quality that would last me years. Disappointed I sent the money on this on could not return :/
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Mnn

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Aveda makes a great product. Last brush I had lasted over 25 years! I did prefer the oval, though. This one is square.
customer_reviews.author: Berryjazzy

customer_reviews.title: Knock off product
customer_reviews.text: This seems cheaply made. Don’t think this is an Aveda product - very pricy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for wet hair comb through
customer_reviews.text: I've had this brush style a number of years. This one is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Maxey

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Expensive brush, but you pay for the name, and what your wife wants!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: gift for my friend
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift is for my friend. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as good as old brush.
customer_reviews.text: Had a brush like this for a few years and it finally fell apart. This was supposed to be the same Aveda brush but it's not as good quality. It's much lighter. It doesn't seem like it will hold up as well.
customer_reviews.author: D Leep

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality, BUT it is hard to get the hair out when you clean the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Race

customer_reviews.title: THE paddle brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush and how well it runs through thick hair! I gave it 4 stars because i received it with bristle missing!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Aveda Wooden Large Paddle Brush is one of the best brushes i ever
customer_reviews.text: Aveda Wooden Large Paddle Brush is one of the best brushes i ever use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: My hair is fine. Does a decent job getting out knots
customer_reviews.author: Ravqueen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Great hair brush, but it arrived faulty. It's missing one of its bristles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Aveda Wooden Large Paddle Brush (NEW) by Aveda BEAUTY
